description: Part first floor side/front extension; part single and part two storey rear extension; rear roof extension to main roofslope; associated internal and external alterations; incorporating front gable end window; and installation of two rooflight to front roofslope.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing titles: CR11-02-1001 Revision 1st Jul-17 Existing Plans; CR11-02-1002 Revision 1st Jul-17 Existing Plans; CR11-02-1003 Revision 1st Jul-17 Existing Elevations; CR11-02-1004 Revision 1st Jul-17 Existing Elevations; CR11-02-1005 Revision 1st Jul-17 Proposed Plans; CR11-02-1006A Revision A Jul-17 Proposed Plans; CR11-02-1007 Revision 1st Jul-17 Proposed Elevations; CR11-02-1008 Revision 1st Jul-17 Proposed Elevations; CR11-02-1009 Revision 1st Jul-17 Location and Block Plan;

Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision and the application form, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | The hereby approved windows at second floor level to the eastern elevation of the dwellinghouse, as indicated within drawings: CR11-02-1006A; and CR11-02-1008; and at first floor level to the western elvation of the dwellinghouse, as indicated within drawings: CR11-02-1005; CR11-02-1008; shall be obscure glazed up to a height of 1.7 metres from internal floor level and permanently retained for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013).
